source: Trump intends to sign border deal to avoid another shutdown. President Donald Trump intends to sign the border security deal to avoid another partial government shutdown, according to two sources who have spoken directly with the President.

Trump says he has other 'options' for paying for border wall. President Trump said Wednesday that Democrats are being “stingy” with money for a border wall, but he has other options to pay for it and wants to avoid another government shutdown.
Trump Is Expected to Sign Border-Security Deal. The bill, which would keep government open past Friday, allocates $1.38 billion for 55 miles of physical barriers, falling short of Trump’s demands
target: President Trump Intends To Sign Border Deal. President Trump is expected to sign the border deal that will keep the government open and provide $1.38 billion for physical barriers.
